Name: 408 - The Forbidden Room
About the game: An indie horror game that tells the story of a supposedly cursed room in a hotel called the Dolphin Hotel. created by a person Your name is Alex, a newly hired janitor at the Hotel Dolphin, making your first night at his new night job, with the main objective of cleaning and organizing all the rooms for future guests, however, there seems to be something wrong with this hotel. A room, where few would have the courage to stay, and where many stories were told. Discover the mystery behind this dark place - An intense atmosphere - A short game depending on your gameplay. - The game's history will be revealed as you progress.
